001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.utils;
002
003
004import android.os.Handler;
005import android.os.Looper;
006
007import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
008
009import java.util.Objects;
010import java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingDeque;
011import java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor;
012import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
013
014public class BackgroundThreadHandler {
015    public static final String TAG = BackgroundThreadHandler.class.getCanonicalName();
016    private final ThreadPoolExecutor threadPoolExecutor;
017
018    private BackgroundThreadHandler(@NonNull final ThreadPoolExecutor threadPoolExecutor) {
019        this.threadPoolExecutor = threadPoolExecutor;
020    }
021
022    public static BackgroundThreadHandler singleBackgroundThreadHandler() {
023        return multiBackgroundThreadsHandler(1);
024    }
025
026    public static BackgroundThreadHandler multiBackgroundThreadsHandler(final int numThreads) {
027        return new BackgroundThreadHandler(new ThreadPoolExecutor(numThreads, numThreads, 0L, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS, new LinkedBlockingDeque<>()));
028    }
029
030    public void post(@NonNull final Runnable runnable) {
031        Objects.requireNonNull(runnable);
032        this.threadPoolExecutor.execute(runnable);
033    }
034
035    public static void postOnMainThread(@NonNull final Runnable runnable) {
036        Objects.requireNonNull(runnable);
037        getMainHandler().post(runnable);
038    }
039
040    private static Handler getMainHandler() {
041        return new Handler(Looper.getMainLooper());
042    }
043}
